titleStmt.title: A banquet of ieasts. Or Change of cheare Being a collection of moderne jests. Witty ieeres. Pleasant taunts. Merry tales.
Banquet of jests. Part 1.
titleStmt.author: Armstrong, Archie, d. 1672, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Ivie-Lane next the Exchequer Office,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Anonimos; sometimes attributed to Archie Armstrong.
The words "moderne jests. .. Merry tales." are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
